Summary: Round, Metallic, Object, seen by Pilot
divs: sighting detailsi was flying a small private aircraft about 30nm south of memphis. it was about 3:00pm, clear weather, unlimited visibility. my passenger was a customer of mine who is now deceased. we were at 3000agl in level flight, smooth air. i saw a bright light to the ne, moving at a 45 degree to my flight path toward the sw. it passed in front and below us. it was close, real close. it was round and metallic, speed about 600mph plus. when it was at a 45 degree off my left wing, behind me to the sw, it vanished. one second it was there then it wasn't. someone from mufon talked to me about it a few days later. i also had a dream that night. in the dream i was inside the craft. there were three beings with me. they had big heads and large eyes. i was at the controls as one of them was trying to teach me how to fly it. i said to him her, i can't fly this thing. he\she said, yes you can it's easy. we were thinking to each other, not talking with sound.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Memphis
There were no other sightings in Memphis on or around October 10th 1989
